value:
$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|Well, well, well. So we meet again.
Give me some candy, or I'll be forced
to suck your blood...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロジョーカー,ch05_14_Joker_M_halloween17,Face|I've gotten what I've come for—
ingredients for my liege Corrin's
favorite treat. I should be going...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|B-but the winners get some kind of
legendary candy, or so I've heard...
I...I really want it!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|Me too! So let's get this over with!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|Trick or treat!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|Give me some candy, or I'll stomp
you flat!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|Aww, we lost. It was a lot of fun,
though!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|I... I just wanted the legendary
candy... Just a taste...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hooray! We won! It's thanks to you,
$Nu!$k$pSay hello to a year's supply of
pumpkins! And the legendary candy,
too, of course...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Pumpkins... She keeps talking about
pumpkins...$k$pForget the pumpkins! Tell me about
the candy. How much do you think it's
worth on the open market?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I don't know, Commander. But I hear
that it has been guarded well—for
over 1,000 years!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That...doesn't sound safe to eat.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Look at Princess Sakura, standing
there, transfixed by the legendary
candy. We...might want to pack it up.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|The festival may be over, but I hope
you'll call on us sometime!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロサクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_halloween17,Face|Y-yes! On my pride as a nekomata,
I'll do my best to protect you!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロジョーカー,ch05_14_Joker_M_halloween17,Face|As long as my liege has no
objections, neither do I.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロノノ,ch04_13_Nono_F_halloween17,Face|That's the spirit! Just make sure to
stock up on candy first!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|Bye-byesies...for now!$k$p$Sbs150|
